example.text: LINCOLN, NEBRASKA – Today, US Congressman Mike Flood issued a statement following news that Siemens AG Chairman Jim Hagemann Snabe had called for 1 billion fewer people to consume meat during a session at the World Economic Forum’s (WEF) annual meeting, also known as Davos 2023. “The globalists are at it again – pushing their plans for shifting the world towards a vegan diet as they dream of ending meat production.

Mr. Speaker, I thank the gentlewoman from Missouri for yielding. Mr. Speaker, the Equal Opportunity for All Investors Act of 2023 will give Americans new opportunities to grow their wealth and savings.
We have legislation today that would make for a thorough but fair examination for investors that want to become accredited investors. Mr. Speaker, I urge my colleagues to support my bill.

This bill also ensures that the taxpayer dollars being spent in Ukraine have proper oversight. Under our NDAA, a new inspector general will direct and coordinate an audit of all aid provided to Ukraine by the United States.
We have legislation today that would make for a thorough but fair examination for investors that want to become accredited investors. Mr. Speaker, I urge my colleagues to support my bill.
